segments.text: Thank you for calling ABC Company , may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m Liu Yi . I ’ d like to speak to Mr . Smith .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , we have two Smiths , Robert Smith and James Smith , which one would you like to speak to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d like to speak with Mr . Robert Smith .
segments.speaker: S2
